duties_responsibilities.duty: Monitoring, identification and response to cyber security incidents.
Conducting cyber security investigation at the network, endpoint, and cloud.
Host based and Network packet capture/traffic analysis.
Developing and fine-tuning SIEM Rules to detect security incidents and anomalies.
Researching and analyzing local and worldwide cyber threat streams against Coupang.
Leading major investigations and managing a team of responders and investigators.
Providing situational awareness on cyber threats, actors, and TTPs relevant to Coupang.
Developing technical and executive incident and investigation reports.
Overseeing routine security administration and mentoring a dedicated team of analysts and investigators.
Conducting security audits, vulnerability assessments, and risk analysis.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Cyber Security, Information Technology, or related field (Master's preferred)
